alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 5:28PM CDT until July 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bottineau County in north central North Dakota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Souris, or 17 miles northwest of Bottineau, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Souris around 545 PM CDT. Bottineau around 620 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Carbury and Roth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
